helpMain:
**__How to join a simulation game?__**
When a game is live, it will be announced in {game-warning}. Click on the join game button to join a game server.
Read more about how to play in {how-to-play}. Ranked games will be announced in {ranked-warn}.

For any questions head over to {support-and-questions}.

Use following commands with {clientUser}'s prefix ({prefix}).
helpEconomy:
`shop` Buy different items in the shop.
`daily` Get coins, roses, items as a daily reward.
`inventory` Find the roses, coins, items in your inventory.
`balance` Check how many narrator bot coins you got.
`namechange` Give your custom role a new name.
`colorchange` Give your custom role a new color.
`profile` Check out your exclusive profile. Available in the shop!
`use` Use this command with the item name such as lootbox, icon to use them.
`rose` Give roses and bouquets during a game.
helpFun:
`emoji` use emojis from different servers available from `emojilist`.
`write` Write something with fancy letters and numbers.
helpBot:
`settings` Customize your preferred language for the bot replies.
`botinfo` Get to know more about the bot.
`bug` Report a bug to the development team.
`suggest` Suggest an improvement or enhancement for Narrator Bot.
`roleinfo` Know more about the in-game roles and interactions.
